Text: RE Attached Files Cc Okay folks were going to try this one more time Attached are revised copies of the ratifications with the date on the first page The last page should stay the same as the original version If there are any problems let me know EMG Ratification of Enron GuarantyDOC Ratification of New Power GuarantyDOC

RE Attached Files Cc It has been pointed out that the ratifications did not have an effective date I have added an effective date to the last page of each and revised copies are attached Please note that both ratifications require the signature of all parties Marcus please make sure the proper parties at Enron sign the New Power ratification EMG Ratification of Enron GuarantyDOC Ratification of New Power GuarantyDOC

RE Attached Files Cc Attached is a slightly revised version of the Second Amendment The word party in the second sentence of paragraph has been capitalized and the line in Exhibit B regarding replacement collateral has been deleted These changes were part of Elizabeth Sagers comments earlier If you have any questions please call ndamddoc

security agreement New Power Cc Attached is a revised version of the General Security Agreement reflecting the comments from our call with Lisa and Marcus this afternoon I have included both a clean copy and a copy blacklined against the draft sent to NewPower If you have any questions please let me or David know We can be reached by email or at home Davids home number is and my home number is EMG COMPGenSecdoc GenSecAgrdoc
